Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-11053 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-11053 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.30.3-3, affected by CVE-2024-11053
